data.actual_result: The Slowmode slider goes back to "Slowmode is off"
data.expected_result: The slider should stay in the position it used to be before rotating your device
data.short_description: "Slowmode Cooldown" slider resets when rotating the device
data.steps_to_repro: - Open channel settings - Scroll down and move the Slowmode Cooldown slider (don't save) - Rotate the device
